attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app was so terrible it didn’t even allow me in and when it did it was very glitchy I seen Donald Trumps face a lot and it just made everything even more worse this app should be demolished .

attributes.title: Trump is a BAD man!
attributes.review: He is so lining health care to trans people, he allows some states to KILL lgbt people for no reason, he is putting America in even more debt! And he is going to make some apps banned in America for literally no reason other than being a wimp.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: It took hours to download and it was taken so much of my battery life, made my phone really glitchy, and the app in self is horrible 😪worse thing I’m not even a trump supporter after that 🤧

I mean what a great president. His new slogan is just amazing. Keep America Great can’t be truer enough. Because of our fantastic leader, we are #1 in COVID cases. Canada has only had 107 K cases while we’ve had over 3 million. Clearly President Trump is dominating over all other countries. God bless Donald Trump.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE🤦🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: I tried to download the app but EVERY time it made my phone shut off!!😾 I DOWNLOAD THE APP AND THEN IT THREATENS ME!! IT SAID “Vote for trump or your IP address will get leaked” IM IN DANGER😭😭😭😭😭😭 I feel hurt..I feel...like I’m...in...DANGER😰 I JUST WANT TO DOWNLOAD THE APP😢 EVEN MY CAT GOT SCARED😾he puked ON my lap and I don’t feel safe!! This is NOT recommended in MY opinion. THEN THERE WAS A PICTURE OF TRUMP YELLING AT ME ;((( I CRY I CRY I CRY I CRY I CRYYY😭

attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: When I opened the app I was met with pop up ads of pornography that gave my phone a corrosive virus. It deleted all of my contacts and photos for no apparent reason. I wish I could give this a 0 rating!!!

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: It’s so terrible designed (just like his wall) and it took forever to load. And just to open it up to see his face?? What a sight. And it asked for my phone number, what’s he gonna do? Call me? No<3
